Allright, this is hopefully the last time I'm going to have to write a post like this:

My hard drive gave out yet again yesterday. This time it was very serious, and I've been trying to fix it ever since it crashed (laptop was at the university, so I didn't have a usable comp). It looks alright now, but I only have 5 gigs of undamaged space out of the 20 that were originally on it :-(.

Anyways, I have work early tomorrow so I have to go, but I'll post tomorrow. I'm hopefully getting a new hard drive soon.
